title: Michel Mercier Detangling Brush (Fine Hair)
description: Gently detangle your hair in seconds without pain or hair loss. Designed by international hair designer, Michel Mercier, the revolutionary As Seen on TV Ultimate Detangling Brush has a unique patented brush surface. Its 428 perfectly placed, varying-length bristles glide through your hair to detangle in fewer strokes without pulling. Available in three styles to match all hair types - pink for fine hair; blue for thick hair; and green for normal hair. Specify style on order. 8 1/4"L x 3 3/4"W.

title: Neutrogena Pore Refining Daily Cleanser, 6.7 Ounce
description: Visibly Reduces the Appearance of Pores and Refines Skin Alpha and beta hydroxy formula with gentle microbeads.
